Google announced Thursday that co-founder Larry Page , pictured in 2007, would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman and focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. The firm's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will work on strategic projects and new products, Google said in a statement. It said the management changes would take effect on April 4.

Bloomberg)-- Andy Coulson resigned as director of communications for U.K. Prime Minister David Cameron , citing "continuing pressures" over allegations of illegal phone tapping while he was editor of the News of the World newspaper. Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in an e-mailed statement today. Egypt's Supreme Council of Antiquities( SCA) sent the request to the Prussian Cultural Heritage Foundation, which runs the Neues Museum in the German capital where the bust is kept. The foundation's position on the return of Nefertiti remains unchanged, foundation president Professor Hermann Parzinger said in a statement. "She is and remains the ambassador of Egypt in Berlin."
